import React, { useState, useEffect, useCallback } from "react"; function CustomerList(props) { const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = React.useState(true); const [data, setData] = React.useState([]); React.useEffect(() => { const url = "http://localhost:9191/api/customers"; fetch(url) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((json) => setData(json['results'])) .catch((error) => console.log(error)); }, []); React.useEffect(() => { if (data.length !== 0) { setIsLoading(false); } console.log(data); }, [data]); return ( <>

); } export default CustomerList;
